RuleDetails.Rules:
APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
RULE - 026/IR01
FROM/TO IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF
WY FARES BETWEEN IRAN AND MIDDLE EAST.
 APPLICATION
   AREA
     THESE FARES APPLY
     BETWEEN IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF AND MIDDLE EAST.
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR FIRST/BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS
     SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/SINGLE OPEN-JAW/DOUBLE OPEN-JAW
     JOURNEYS.
 CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
   THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED
   ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH
   FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS.
   THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE
   AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE
   CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT
 OTHER CONDITIONS
   PASSENGER EXPENSES NOT PERMITTED

SEASONALITY
FOR HIGH SEASON FARES
  PERMITTED 11MAR THROUGH 25MAR OR 16JUN THROUGH 14SEP OR
  11DEC THROUGH 31DEC ON THE FIRST INTERNATIONAL SECTOR.

FLIGHT APPLICATION
FROM/TO IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF
  THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        WY FLIGHTS 5009 THROUGH 5100
        WY FLIGHTS 5780 THROUGH 5999
        WY FLIGHTS 5671 THROUGH 5773
        WY FLIGHTS 5559 THROUGH 5649
        WY FLIGHTS 5551 THROUGH 5556
        WY FLIGHTS 5450 THROUGH 5549
        WY FLIGHTS 5443 THROUGH 5448
        WY FLIGHTS 5117 THROUGH 5440
        KU FLIGHTS 6000 THROUGH 6999.
  AND
  THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY WY FLIGHT
        ANY KU FLIGHT
        ANY EY FLIGHT.

ADVANCE RES/TICKETING
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
         NOTE -
          WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE
          ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION
          CODE -RBD-.
          -----------------
          IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE WY RES
          THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATES
          REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
          -------------------------
          IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR
          WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL REMAINING
          SECTORS.
          --------------------------------
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
         NOTE -
          TICKETING DEADLINES BASED ON DATE OF RESERVATIONS
          -------------------------------------------------
          DATE OF RESERVATION    TICKETING TO BE COMPLETED
          FROM DEPARTURE DATE    WITHIN
          -------------------    ---------------------
          MORE THAN 121DAYS  -  90 DAYS
          120-91 DAYS        -  60 DAYS
          90- 60  DAYS       -  30 DAYS
          59-30 DAYS         -  20 DAYS
          29-15 DAYS         -  07 DAYS
          14-08 DAYS         -  03 DAYS
          07-04 DAYS         -  24 HOURS
          03-02 DAYS         -  06 HOUR
          01-00 DAYS         -  IMMEDIATE TICKETING
          -----------------------------------------------
          DUE TO AUTOMATED TICKETING DEADLINE CONTROL
          DIFFERENCES COULD EXIST BETWEEN THE FARE RULE
          LAST TICKETING DATE AND THE SYSTEM GENERATED
          TICKETING DEADLINE MESSAGE.
          THE MORE RESTRICTIVE TICKETING DEADLINE APPLIES
          --------------------------------------------------
          WY RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR WHERE
          ITINERARIES DO NOT COMPLY WITH RESERVATION CODE-
          RBD.
          --------------------------------------------------
          IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE WY RES
          THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATES
          REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
          --------------------------------------------------
          IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR WY
          RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL REMAINING SECTORS.

MAXIMUM STAY
FOR -6M TYPE FARES
  TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 6
  MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

STOPOVERS
FROM/TO IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF
  1 FREE STOPOVER PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
       1 INBOUND.
         NOTE -
          ONE ADDITIONAL FREE STOPOVER CAN BE PERMITTED ON
          OUTBOUND IF THE FARE IS HIGHER THAN
          MCT LEVEL. IF FARE IS LESS THAN MCT LEVEL THE
          FARE MUST BE RAISED TO MCT LEVEL TO HAVE A FREE
          OUTBOUND STOPOVER

TRANSFERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
    FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE
     FARE COMPONENT.
         NOTE -
          TRAVEL ON THIS FARE DOES NOT PERMIT TRANSFER
          CONNECTION IN MCT BEYOND 24HRS

PERMITTED COMBINATIONS
FOR U- TYPE FARES

SURCHARGES
FROM/TO IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF
  THERE IS NO CHARGE.
         NOTE -
          ISSUANCE OF PAPER TICKET ON E/T ENABLE SECTORS
          WILL RESULT IN ADM BEING RAISED BY OMAN AIR
NONE FOR U- TYPE FARES

SALES RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON WY.

PENALTIES
FOR U- TYPE FARES
  CANCELLATIONS
    ANY TIME
      CHARGE USD 50.00 FOR REFUND.
         NOTE -
          INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
  CHANGES
    ANY TIME
      CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION.
         NOTE -
          1 CHANGE PERMITTED FREE OF COST AND ADDITIONAL
          CHANGES AT USD 25.00.
          -------
          INF WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
  CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
    ANY TIME
      CHARGE USD 50.00 FOR NO-SHOW.
         NOTE -
          NO SHOW FEE MUST BE COLLECTED IN ADDITION TO
          CHANGE /REFUND FEE.
          -----------
          INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
    CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS PERMITTED.
         NOTE -
          GENERAL RULES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
          -------------------------------------------
          A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE.
          -------------------------------------------
          IF REISSUE IS MADE AFTER SCHEDULED DEPARTURE TIME
          OF CHANGED FLIGHT THEN THE NO-SHOW FEE WILL APPLY.
          -------------------------------------------
          // REFUNDABLE TICKETS  //
          PENALTY CHARGE WILL APPLY AS PER THE RULE.
          INF WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
          ----------------------------------------------
          ALL TAXES INCLUDING YQ/YR/Q SURCHARGE WILL BE
          REFUNDED.
          ---------------------------
          ---------------------------
          // NON REFUNDABLE TICKETS  //
          YQ/YR AND Q SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
          GOVT TAXES WILL BE REFUNDED.
          --------------------------------------
          // PARTIALLY UTILIZED TICKETS  //
          PARTIAL REFUND WILL APPLY ON SAME RBD OR NEXT
          HIGHER VALUE. NO PENALTY CHARGE ON PARTIAL REFUND.
          --------------------------
          // IN CASE OF UPGRADE //
          IF DATE AND FLIGHT IS NOT CHANGED - ONLY RBD IS
          CHANGED THEN DATE CHANGE PENALTY WILL NOT BE
          COLLECTED.
          ---------------------------------------
          UPGRADE TO HIGHER CABIN. NO DATE CHANGE PENALTY
          WILL APPLY.
          --------------------------------------
          REFUND RULE OR PENALTY MUST CARRY FORWARD AS PER
          ORIGINAL TICKET.
          --------------------------------------
          IN CASE OF COMBINATION MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS
          WILL APPLY.
          --------------------------------------
          // REFUND CHARGES WAIVED INCASE OF DEATH OF
          PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER//
          --------------------------------------------------
          A COPY OF VALID DEATH CERTIFICATE ISSUED BY A
          COMPETENT MEDICAL AUTHORITY IS REQUIRED.
          FAMILY MEMBERS AS DEFINED IN WY CONDITIONS OF
          CARRIAGE OR PASSENGER AIRLINE TARIFF RULE BOOK.
          CONTACT WY OFFICE FOR WAIVERS DEFINED ABOVE.
          --------------------------------------------------

HIP/MILEAGE EXCEPTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY FOR
  STOPOVERS.
  AND - THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY
        FOR CONNECTIONS.

TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
  NON END - AND - VALID ON WY ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
  ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
        TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
         NOTE -
          ONCE A CHILD COMPLETE 12YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
          AS ADULT.
          --------------------------------------------------
  OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
         NOTE -
          ONCE A CHILD COMPLETE 12YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
          AS ADULT.
          --------------------------------------------------
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 20 PERCENT OF
         THE FARE.
         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
           COMPARTMENT BY ADULT.
         NOTE -
          ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
          AS CHILD.
          --------------------------------------------------
          WHEN INFANT REACHES 2YEARS OF AGE ON/BEFORE
          DEPARTURE FROM POINT OF TURNAROUND A SEAT MUST BE
          BOOKED ON THE RETURN LEG AND THE APPLICABLE CHILD
          FARE CHARGED ON HALF ROUNDTRIP BASIS WITH OUTBOUND
          INFANT FARE.
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE.
         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
           COMPARTMENT BY ADULT.
         NOTE -
          ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
          AS CHILD.
          --------------------------------------------------

MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  THIS FARE MUST NOT BE USED AS THE HIGH OR THE LOW FARE
  WHEN CALCULATING A DIFFERENTIAL. THIS FARE MUST NOT BE
  USED AS THE THROUGH FARE WHEN PRICING A FARE COMPONENT
  WITH A DIFFERENTIAL.

VOLUNTARY CHANGES
DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS
ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION

PENALTIES
FOR U- TYPE FARES
  CANCELLATIONS
    ANY TIME
      CHARGE USD 50.00 FOR REFUND.
         NOTE -
          INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
  CHANGES
    ANY TIME
      CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION.
         NOTE -
          1 CHANGE PERMITTED FREE OF COST AND ADDITIONAL
          CHANGES AT USD 25.00.
          -------
          INF WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
  CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
    ANY TIME
      CHARGE USD 50.00 FOR NO-SHOW.
         NOTE -
          NO SHOW FEE MUST BE COLLECTED IN ADDITION TO
          CHANGE /REFUND FEE.
          -----------
          INFANT WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
  CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS
    CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS PERMITTED.
         NOTE -
          GENERAL RULES UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
          -------------------------------------------
          A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE.
          -------------------------------------------
          IF REISSUE IS MADE AFTER SCHEDULED DEPARTURE TIME
          OF CHANGED FLIGHT THEN THE NO-SHOW FEE WILL APPLY.
          -------------------------------------------

          PENALTY CHARGE WILL APPLY AS PER THE RULE.
          INF WITHOUT A SEAT EXEMPTED.
          ----------------------------------------------

          REFUNDED.
          ---------------------------
          ---------------------------

          YQ/YR AND Q SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
          GOVT TAXES WILL BE REFUNDED.

          --------------------------------------

          ORIGINAL TICKET.
          --------------------------------------
          IN CASE OF COMBINATION MOST RESTRICTIVE CONDITIONS

          PASSENGER OR FAMILY MEMBER//
          --------------------------------------------------

          COMPETENT MEDICAL AUTHORITY IS REQUIRED.
          FAMILY MEMBERS AS DEFINED IN WY CONDITIONS OF
          CARRIAGE OR PASSENGER AIRLINE TARIFF RULE BOOK.
          CONTACT WY OFFICE FOR WAIVERS DEFINED ABOVE.
          --------------------------------------------------

  AND - THE HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINT RULE DOES NOT APPLY

  NON END - AND - VALID ON WY ONLY - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
  ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
        TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
         NOTE -

          AS ADULT.
          --------------------------------------------------
  OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE
         FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
         NOTE -
          ONCE A CHILD COMPLETE 12YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
          AS ADULT.
          --------------------------------------------------
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 20 PERCENT OF
         THE FARE.
         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
           COMPARTMENT BY ADULT.
         NOTE -
          ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
          AS CHILD.
          --------------------------------------------------
          WHEN INFANT REACHES 2YEARS OF AGE ON/BEFORE
          DEPARTURE FROM POINT OF TURNAROUND A SEAT MUST BE
          BOOKED ON THE RETURN LEG AND THE APPLICABLE CHILD

  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 75 PERCENT OF THE

         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME

         NOTE -
          ONCE AN INFANT COMPLETE 2YEARS WILL BE CONSIDERED
